member.name: M:Microsoft.Silverlight.Windows.Installer.CheckNESLInstalled(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks to see if the NESL native runtime is installed on the machine. This function returns true if the supplied NESL installer has been used to install the runtime.
member.param: The major version of the current runtime
The minor version of the current runtime

member.name: M:Microsoft.Silverlight.Windows.Installer.InstallNESL(System.Uri,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Invokes the MSI installer to install the NESL runtime from within a Silverlight OOB app running in elevated trust.
member.param: URI to the NESL MSI installer package. Can be locally included in the XAP, or remotely hosted. If locally included in the XAP, the build action on the installer package must be set to Content and the relative URI to the package in the XAP should be passed in. If remotely hosted and accessed over the public internet, it is advisable to use a secure HTTP connection.
False if the installer is contained in the XAP. Default is true.
False if you do not want to display the standard MSI install progress dialog. Default is is true.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Silverlight.Windows.BaseCOMObjectWrapper
member.summary: A base class for Silverlight objects that wrap COM automation capable components.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Silverlight.Windows.BaseCOMObjectWrapper.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of BaseCOMObjectWrapper. Also attempts to instantiate the underlying COM automation component based on the supplied Prog ID.
member.remarks: You cannot construct an instance of the abstract BaseCOMObjectWrapper class directly. The BaseCOMObjectWrapper constructors exist to help you properly initialize an instance of a derived class.
member.param: Prog ID for the COM Automation object

member.name: M:Microsoft.Silverlight.Windows.BaseCOMObjectWrapper.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of BaseCOMObjectWrapper with an already created COM automation object.
member.remarks: You cannot construct an instance of the abstract BaseCOMObjectWrapper class directly. The BaseCOMObjectWrapper constructors exist to help you properly initialize an instance of a derived class.
member.param: An instance of a COM Automation object

member.name: M:Microsoft.Silverlight.Windows.BaseCOMObjectWrapper.Dispose
member.summary: Call to explicitly dispose an instance as well as release the underlying the COM automation object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Silverlight.Windows.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Silverlight.Windows.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Silverlight.Windows.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Silverlight.Windows.Resources.MSG_AUTOMATIONNOTAVAILABLE
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to COM Automation not available.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Silverlight.Windows.Resources.MSG_ERR_MANIFEST
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Manifest Error.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Silverlight.Windows.Resources.MSG_ERR_MANIFEST_PARSE
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Error parsing manifest.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Silverlight.Windows.Resources.MSG_ERROR_LIBRARY
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Error installing {0}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Silverlight.Windows.Resources.MSG_ERROR_LIBRARYNOTFOUND
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Error downloading {0} : Library not found.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Silverlight.Windows.Resources.MSG_INVALID_CATALYST_INSTALLPATH
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid path : Please make sure you provide a valid and absolute path to install the libraries.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Silverlight.Windows.Resources.MSG_MISSING_MANIFEST_VERSION
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Error: Manifest version required.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Silverlight.Windows.Resources.MSG_NULLARGUMENT
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid Argument : Null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Silverlight.Windows.Resources.MSG_REGISTRYACCESS
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Required registry access not allowed.
